00041 // ===========================================================================
00042 // method definitions
00043 // ===========================================================================
00044 MSRouteLoaderControl::MSRouteLoaderControl(MSNet&,
00045         int inAdvanceStepNo,
00046         LoaderVector loader)
00047     : myLastLoadTime(-inAdvanceStepNo),
00048       myInAdvanceStepNo(inAdvanceStepNo),
00049       myRouteLoaders(loader),
00050       myAllLoaded(false) {
00051     myLoadAll = myInAdvanceStepNo <= 0;
00052     myAllLoaded = false;
00053     myLastLoadTime = -1 * (int) myInAdvanceStepNo;
00054     // initialize all used loaders
00055     for (LoaderVector::iterator i = myRouteLoaders.begin();
00056             i != myRouteLoaders.end(); ++i) {
00057         (*i)->init();
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 MSRouteLoaderControl::~MSRouteLoaderControl() {
00063     for (LoaderVector::iterator i = myRouteLoaders.begin();
00064             i != myRouteLoaders.end(); ++i) {
00065         delete(*i);
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 void
00071 MSRouteLoaderControl::loadNext(SUMOTime step) {
00072     // check whether new vehicles shall be loaded
00073     //  return if not
00074     if ((myLoadAll && myAllLoaded) || (myLastLoadTime >= 0 && myLastLoadTime/*+myInAdvanceStepNo*/ >= step)) {
00075         return;
00076     }
00077     // load all routes for the specified time period
00078     SUMOTime run = step;
00079     bool furtherAvailable = true;
00080     for (;
00081             furtherAvailable &&
00082             (myLoadAll || run <= step + (SUMOTime) myInAdvanceStepNo);
00083             run++) {
00084         furtherAvailable = false;
00085         for (LoaderVector::iterator i = myRouteLoaders.begin();
00086                 i != myRouteLoaders.end(); ++i) {
00087             if ((*i)->moreAvailable()) {
00088                 (*i)->loadUntil(run);
00089             }
00090             furtherAvailable |= (*i)->moreAvailable();
00091         }
00092     }
00093     // no further loading when all was loaded
00094     if (myLoadAll || !furtherAvailable) {
00095         myAllLoaded = true;
00096     }
00097     // set the step information
00098     myLastLoadTime = run - 1;
00099 }
